translate-en: 'Alqama b. Muhammad al-Hadrami says: I requested from Imam al-Baqir (a) "teach me something so that I can recite it when I visit him (Imam al-Husayn (a)) from nearby on this day (day of 'Ashura): and teach me something so that I can recite it when I want to direct my salutation toward him from far regions from Karbala and from my home. The Imam said: O 'Alqama, after you direct salutation toward him, pray two Rak'as, and after prayer, recite this Ziyara, by reciting this Ziyara you have truly called him in the way that angels call him when they want to address him
In the name of Allah the All-Merciful the All-Compassionate
peace Be upon you O? AbA- Abdollah, peace Be upon you O? the prophet? s son, peace Be Upon you O? the son of the commander of the faithful and the son of  the master of the recommended

peace Be upon you O? the fatemeh's son ? the Queen of women of the world, peace Be upon you O? the blood of God . God will avenge those who martyred Imam Hussain, And O? the Imam Ali's son that  God will avenge those who martyred Imam Ali, And O?  the Imam that  were killed all of your friends and families and you were left alone and plundered your tents.

peace Be Upon you and the innocent souls that have buried  along side you in your holy shrine ? God's greeting be upon all of you for ever on my part? until I will be alive and the day  and  the night  will be continued
O? AbA - Abdollah  how big is  your bereavement  and your suffering is very immense for us and for all of the muslims
And  how huge is  your bereavement in the heavens for its dwellers, So May God curse the people who established the bases of cruelty and injustice on the house hold of the prophet
May God curse those who stood up to you? so as to you could not obtain your standing ?and  they usurped your ranking that God were allocated for you
May God curse those who killed you?  May God curse the people who obeyed the cruel and the  dominant  rulers for fighting you
I hate them and their companions and followers  with giving heed to God and  the house hold of the prophet

O? AbA-  Abdollah  I am making peace with the people who they are peaceful with you and I am  fighting the people who they are 
war like  with you until the Day of Judgement
And May God curse  the dynasty of zyad and the dynasty of marvan ?  May God curse all of the ommiades --sa'ad?  May God curse the marjaneh? s son  ? May God curse omar-ebn- May God curse  shemr
May God curse the people who saddled up and  bridled the horses , and  prepared themselves for fighting you, My father and my mother be sacrificed for you

Your bereavement is very painful  for me, God have honoured your dignity  and have given blessing  me because of you? so I ask God grant me a success for accompanying the victorious Imam from the house hold of the  prophet for revenging your enemies ( May God bless  him and his house hold
O? God give me a reputation in the presence of yourself due to Imam Hussain  (upon Him Be peace) In the world and the future life
O? AbA - Abdollah I gain favour with God ? his messenger ? the commander of the believers ? fatemeh ? Imam Hassan and you with love and affection to  you

and by hating your enemies and those who established the bases of injustice and cruelty  with you and made their oppressive rules ?and kept on their cruelty to you and your followers?I hate them by taking notice of God and you

I find favour with God? then I turn my attention to you  by love and affection for you and your friends and also I hate your enemies ? those who fought against you ? I hate their friends and followers
I am peace-loving with your companions ? I am in fighting with your enemies ? I am friendly to your friends and I am enemy with your enemies

So I ask God who have honoured me due to  insight towards you and your friends and have given  blessing me for hating your  enemies ? adopt me in the world and the future life along side you and give me a constancy with truth and bonhomie for staying beside you in the world and the next

O' my God , I ask you reach me the  laudable rank that you have allocated for Imam Hussain and give me a success for  revenging from your enemies along side Imam (Hojjat- ebn-el Hassan) who will appear and reveal the truths and he is from the prophet's house hold

I ask God that give me  the best reward who will bestow to every bereaved? because of your dignity in the presence of God ? how enormous and distressful is your bereavement for the world of Islam and the Heavens and the Earth
O?  God ! I am here - in the Hussain's shrine- so? I want you appoint me among those who you will send forgiveness and greetings them
O? God! put my life in the way of Mohammad and the dynasty of Mohammad and put my death in the way of Mohammad and the dynasty of Mohammad

O?God ! today ( Ashura - 10 th day of Muharram which is the anniversary of the martyrdom of Imam hussain) is a day that the Ommiads ? mo'aviye - the son of cursed liver-eater woman -that cursed (yazid) the mo'aviye? s son- held a celebration where as  you were cursing them and your prophet-may God bless him and his household- was cursing them in every dwelling and accommodation
Please God curse Abu- sofeyan ? moaviye ? yazid the mo'aviye? s son, Curse them forever
today (Ashura) is a day that the dynasty of zeyad and the dynasty of marvan became happy for killing Imam Hussain -Upon Him Be peace
Please God ! redouble your curse and painful torment for those who killed Imam Hussain

O?  God ! today(Ashura) and in this place ( Imam Hussain's shrine) and for my life ?I will follow your content by hating those who killed Imam Hussain ?and cursing them and also with love and affection to your prophet and his household - Upon Him and His household Be peace

So you say 100 times:

O' God curse the first cruel who oppressed Mohammad and his innocent dynasty and also the final cruel who followed the first cruel for oppressing the prophet and his innocent dynasty, O?  God curse the people who fought Imam Hussain and also curse their followers ? and those who swore allegiance to them for killing Imam Hussain ? O?  God curse all of them

So you say 100 times:

Peace Be Upon you O? AbA-Abdollah and the souls have lain at rest beside you in your holy shrine ? God's greeting Be Upon you on my part  for ever  until I will be alive and the world will be continued? O? God do not allot me this pilgrimage as my last treaty with Imam Hussain, Peace Be Upon Hussain ? Peace Be Upon Ali?the Hussain's son ( the fourth Imam) ? Peace Be Upon the Hussain's children and Peace Be Upon the Hussain's friends

So you say:

O' God ! allocate my course for the first cruel and curse him ? then curse the second and the third and the fourth, O' God, curse yazid as a fifth cruel ? curse obeydollah the zeyad? s son and marjaneh ? curse omar -ebn- sa'ad and shemr ? curse the dynasty of Abu- sofian ? the dynasty of zeyad  and the dynasty of marvan until the day of judgement

In worship:

the bereavement of Imam Hussain and his friends just like the true thankful who praise you? I praise you because of my huge bereavement ? God! bestow me the intercession of Imam Hussain in the day of judgement? And firm up my adherence and honesty along side Imam Hussain and his friends ? those who sacrificed their lives for Imam Hussain - Upon Him Be peace
